item.title: How the Bible Changed the World ft. Vishal Mangalwadi [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ May 24, 2024
Dr. Vishal Mangalwadi discusses the impact of scripture on Indian culture and the importance of the Bible in creating modern India. He highlights how rejecting the Bible leads to a loss of freedom and the enslavement of Christianity. He also contrasts Hinduism and Buddhism with the biblical worldview, emphasizing how these religions perpetuate inequality and fail to create the world that scripture does. The conversation then shifts to the education system and the need for the church to take back the responsibility of education. Finally, the discussion touches on the radical sexual agenda in Canada and the importance of the church standing against it. The conversation explores the difference between Indian sexuality and biblical sexuality, with a focus on the influence of Hindu philosophy on the LGBTQ sexual revolution. Hinduism's belief in monism or pantheism, where everything is considered one and is God, leads to the idea that dualism of male and female is an illusion. This philosophy is the basis for the tantric system, which seeks to awaken the female energy within individuals through meditation, yoga, and tantra. The conversation also discusses the historical development of the sexual revolution in the West, influenced by Darwinian and Freudian views, as well as the impact of the Protestant Reformation on the concept of marriage.

 

Episode Resources: The Book that Changed the World by Vishal Mangalwadi: https://www.amazon.ca/Book-that-Made-Your-World-ebook/dp/B004Z70982/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3AGF8UL0K3W4I&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.DaJdeYs0h8yiMxG7_Pz5xJdE4c1QVF1UpEsJ3qLvQHir-uwQy913lnoHRztsZj3MiOorcKXQlMSkxlGrX6eqdn5D9EFsbtFXGC9_AbFR9EJwicQkHP-TriM2_u4TFnBSU11i4Jp9Ud7pVu4f0YMjJvZdHSv7bVbfQBOtQ06CgF9UTTO3r7y9GeXwKu5Ft17l4n9bLJ7Ythik3uz9W5DeTrNCpvIctcOYPvyrgXj_9pE.i_zOiiG8peNawmgW7MsjwQb9ArVoS779hmKsCmAa5z4&dib_tag=se&keywords=mangalwadi&qid=1716584792&s=digital-text&sprefix=mangalwadi%2Cdigital-text%2C87&sr=1-1;
